lead_paragraph: Yahoo shares fell after Verizon Communications announced that it would buy most of Yahoo’s internet businesses for $4.8 billion.

headline.print_headline: Market Weighed Down by Sinking Energy Sector
headline.main: Wall St. Sags, Weighed Down by Sinking Energy Sector

snippet: Yahoo shares fell after Verizon Communications announced that it would buy most of Yahoo’s internet businesses for $4.8 billion....
abstract: Stocks fall moderately following four weeks of gains and record highs; energy companies fare worst due to sinking oil prices.
